features: What is Notion?Notion is like a one-stop-shop where you can think, write, and plan. You can capture thoughts, manage projects, or even run an entire company—all customized to suit your preferences.; How do I download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to your workspace.
